title: Professional Development Course for Science Teachers Based on Lesson Study and Learning Study

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Science Curriculum Content and Basic Pedagogical Understanding, Reflective Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based online collaboration tools in parallel with offline workshops and in-person classroom applications

learning_goals: Can explain core elements and differences between Lesson Study and Learning Study
Can develop and apply observational tools to analyze student learning patterns when designing science lessons
Can collaborate with two or more peers to share and reflect on the design and implementation of model lessons at least once
Can systematically document lesson improvement outcomes in a formal report through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
